name: places/ChIJDWKY9KBZwokRDK-f-Di626E
formattedAddress: 144 E 22nd St Basement, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 144 E 22nd St Basement, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Sammy damaged two of my dress shirts by putting holes through the collars. They  would not even refund the order that caused the damage and offered less than 20% of the shirts’ value as store credits. I have been a regular customer for years and service has always been mixed (although OK), but this is completely inexcusable.

originalText.text: Roy was the BEST to work with. He hand delivered my dress to me because I could not make it in to pick it up! They go above and beyond here. Amazing customer service.

text.text: Roy was the BEST to work with. He hand delivered my dress to me because I could not make it in to pick it up! They go above and beyond here. Amazing customer service.

originalText.text: Hands down the worst dry cleaner I have ever worked with!! Recently moved to NoMad and wanted to find a dry cleaner. After a bit of search, selected Sammy and sent him a set of brand new shirts to be pressed. Shirts came back all miss-pressed and with 2 oil stains on one of the shirt. Called them up to understand why that happened and was more or less informed that since this is pressing, results are not guaranteed plus I haven't been a customer for that long so what did I expect... After a bit of back and forth, they accepted to fix their error, sent the shirts to be re-pressed and the oil stains removed but shirts came back worse with more oil stains.

text.text: Hands down the worst dry cleaner I have ever worked with!! Recently moved to NoMad and wanted to find a dry cleaner. After a bit of search, selected Sammy and sent him a set of brand new shirts to be pressed. Shirts came back all miss-pressed and with 2 oil stains on one of the shirt. Called them up to understand why that happened and was more or less informed that since this is pressing, results are not guaranteed plus I haven't been a customer for that long so what did I expect... After a bit of back and forth, they accepted to fix their error, sent the shirts to be re-pressed and the oil stains removed but shirts came back worse with more oil stains.

originalText.text: I first discovered Sammy at this location and have been using them for the last 8 years. Roy and his team are professional, considerate, caring, and do an amazing job each and every time. Best customer service and staff. I don't trust anyone else more with my drycleaning needs.

text.text: I first discovered Sammy at this location and have been using them for the last 8 years. Roy and his team are professional, considerate, caring, and do an amazing job each and every time. Best customer service and staff. I don't trust anyone else more with my drycleaning needs.

originalText.text: I absolutely love everybody who works at this establishment. They always take incredibly good care of my products and are super communicative. Whenever there is an agreed upon delivery date, they never miss and always deliver exactly as promised. Roy has been taking good care of me for over three years and even went above and beyond to ensure that I was still able to get my clothes and or altered. I’ve never had them lose any of my products, and they have a great organization system to ensure that things come exactly as promised.
